Login.ConfirmationLinkSent: Open the confirmation link sent to your e-mail inbox to confirm changing your password.
Login.ContactAdmin:
Possible reason: your host may have disabled the mail() function.
Please contact your Matomo administrator.
Login.ExceptionInvalidSuperUserAccessAuthentic: A user with superuser access cannot be authenticated using the '%s' mechanism.
Login.ExceptionPasswordMD5HashExpected: The password parameter is expected to be a MD5 hash of the password.
Login.InvalidNonceToken: The form security failed because of a token mismatch. Please reload the form and check that your cookies are on.
Login.InvalidNonceReferrer: The form security failed because of an invalid "Referer" header. If you are using a proxy server, you must %1$sconfigure Matomo to accept the proxy header%2$s that forwards the host header. Also, check that your "Referer" header is sent correctly. If you previously connected using HTTPS, please ensure you are connecting over a secure (SSL/TLS) connection and try again.
Login.InvalidNonceUnexpectedReferrer: The form security failed because the "Referer" header is different from what was expected. Check that it is sent correctly.
Login.InvalidNonceOrigin: The form security failed because of invalid origin. If you previously connected using HTTPS, please ensure you are connecting over a secure (SSL/TLS) connection and try again.
Login.InvalidNonceSSLMisconfigured: Also, you may %1$sforce Matomo to use a secure connection%2$s: in your config file%3$s set %4$s below section %5$s
Login.InvalidOrExpiredToken: The token is invalid or has expired.
Login.InvalidOrExpiredTokenV2: The password has already been set or the link has expired.
Login.HelpIpRange: Enter one IP address or one IP range per line. You can use CIDR notation e.g: %1$s or you can use wildcards, e.g: %2$s or %3$s
Login.SettingBruteForceEnableHelp: Logs out users making too many password guesses within a timeframe for a while. This prevents anyone from testing all combinations. Getting a shared IP blocked also locks out its other users.
Login.SettingBruteForceWhitelistIp: Never block these IPs from logging in
Login.SettingBruteForceBlacklistIp: Always block these IPs from logging in
Login.NotAllowListTakesPrecendence: If an IP is on both the list of IPs to block and never block, it is blocked.
Login.SettingBruteForceMaxFailedLogins: Number of allowed login retries within a given time frame
Login.SettingBruteForceMaxFailedLoginsHelp: Blocks the IP if more than this number of failed logins are recorded within the time frame set below.
Login.SettingBruteForceTimeRange: Count login retries within this time range in minutes
Login.ConfirmPasswordResetIntro: Please type your new password to confirm you really requested having your password changed.
Login.ConfirmPasswordResetWrongPassword: The entered password does not match your newly made one. Reset your password again if you don't remember it. Don't do anything to keep your password if you didn't request changing it.
Login.LoginNotAllowedBecauseBlocked: Too many failed logins. Please wait and try logging in again later.
Login.CurrentlyBlockedIPsUnblockInfo: You can unblock IPs blocked by mistake to allow them to log in again.
Login.PasswordChanged: You can now use your new password to log in.
Login.PasswordResetAlreadySent: You requested too many password resets recently. A new request can be made in one hour. Your administrator can help you if that doesn't work.
Login.PasswordResetCancelEmailSubject: Your Matomo account has been secured
Login.PasswordResetCancelEmail1: We’ve received your report that you did not request the recent password reset attempt for your Matomo account. The reset request has been removed, and no changes have been made to your account.
Login.PasswordResetCancelEmail2: Your account remains secure. For enhanced protection, we recommend enabling two-factor authentication (2FA) to add another layer of security.
Login.PasswordResetCancelEmail3: To enable 2FA, visit your personal account security settings and follow the instructions provided.
Login.PasswordResetEmail1: We received a request to reset the password for your Matomo account from the IP address %1$s. If you initiated this request, you can reset your password by clicking the link below:
Login.PasswordResetEmail2: This link will expire in 24 hours for security reasons.
Login.PasswordResetEmail3: If you did not request this password reset, you can cancel the request by clicking the link below:
Login.PasswordResetEmail4: Your account remains secure, but we encourage you to act quickly if you did not initiate this request.
Login.PasswordResetEmail5: For added security, we recommend enabling two-factor authentication (2FA) after resetting your password.
Login.PluginDescription: Provides username and password login as well as password reset functionality. The login method can be changed by using another login plugin such as LoginLdap available on the marketplace.
Login.SuspiciousLoginAttemptsInLastHourEmailSu: Some suspicious login attempts were made using your username…
Login.SuspiciousLoginAttemptsInLastHourEmail1: A suspiciously high number of login attempts was made on your Matomo account the last hour. Specifically %1$s login attempts from %2$s distinct IP addresses. Someone may be trying to break into your account.
Login.SuspiciousLoginAttemptsInLastHourEmail3: Ensure your password is a secure, random password of at least 30 characters.
Login.SuspiciousLoginAttemptsInLastHourEmail4: Set up two-factor authentication so attackers need more than just your password to log in.
Login.SuspiciousLoginAttemptsInLastHourEmail5: Set up a list of IP addresses to never block if your Matomo has a limited set of users or IPs users access it from. %1$sRead the docs for more info.%2$s
Login.LoginNotAllowedBecauseUserLoginBlocked: Logging in has been turned off since a suspicious amount of failed attempts were made during the last hour.
Login.InvitationHints: (you can leave the page to cancel this action)
Login.PasswordRequired: Please enter your password to continue
Login.BySigningUpPrivacyPolicy: By signing up, I accept the %1$sprivacy policy%2$s
Login.BySigningUpTermsAndCondition: By signing up, I accept the %1$sterms & conditions%2$s
Login.BySigningUpPrivacyPolicyAndTermsAndCondi: By signing up, I accept the %1$sprivacy policy%2$s and the %3$sterms & conditions%4$s
Login.AcceptPrivacyPolicy: You need to accept the privacy policy.
Login.AcceptTermsAndCondition: You need to accept the terms & conditions.
Login.AcceptPrivacyPolicyAndTermsAndCondition: You need to accept the privacy policy and the terms & conditions.
Login.CreatePasswordDescription: Make sure you remember this password and keep it in a safe place.
Login.CancelPasswordResetRequestRemovedMessage: We have recorded that you did not request this password reset. The reset request has been removed, and no changes have been made to your account.
Login.CancelPasswordResetSecurityTip: For added protection, we recommend enabling two-factor authentication (2FA).
